Name: Name Change, Langston Hughes Walk, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, Langston Hughes Walk, Borough of Queens and to repeal local law number 45 for the year 1989.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  Local law number 45 for the year 1989 is hereby REPEALED.
      �2.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________ 
New name			Present name			Limits
________________________________________________________________
Langston Hughes	Northern Boulevard		the northside of 	
Walk							Northern Boulevard
							between 100th Street and 101st Street



      �3. This local law shall take effect immediately.
